page.title: 04Police and other services.
page.content: The services in Oxted are good. There is a small{fire station} with two fire engines & lots of equipment. There is a{ Police Station}with an Inspector in charge of many Constables. There are offices, a canteen & living rooms for unmarried policemen. The same building contains a{Magistrate's Court.} The police cars are blue or white with POLICE written on the doors and a blue light which flashes in emergencies. They have a radio in the car to talk to each other. The{library}has good books & plenty of information. Downsway School takes{5_8}year-olds, St. Mary's Middle School takes{8_12's, & Oxted County School takes{12_18}year old pupils. Near our 900 year old church is our main recreation area , {Master Park , }and further towards the North Downs is Oxted's small{Hospital.
